channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MarketWatch Live: Inflation report matches Wall Street forecast
The DOGE-fueled firing of AI experts at the FDA endangers lives and worsens the hospital crisis
item.description: The FDA fired AI experts who conduct approvals for medical devices and might not get them back.

item.title: Risk of a stock-market correction is rising, Goldman Sachs warns
Bath & Body Works beat 2024 expectations, but its stock fell 12%. Its CEO says she was ‘surprised’ to see Wall Street’s reaction
item.description: Tariffs and uncertain consumer spending dampened Wall Street's enthusiasm for the retailer.

item.title: Investors on edge as PCE data highlights consumer-spending slowdown
Consumers are cutting back spending at the fastest clip in 4 years
item.description: Unseasonably cold weather along with increased uncertainty over tariffs and trade are casting a pall on the economy.

item.title: Friday’s ‘economic blackout’ is a fool’s errand — and gives ‘woke’ a bad name
The legacy media is dead. Long live the legacy media
item.description: Our shared reality has always come from a mix of media, and once a medium has been instantiated, it never really goes away.

item.title: U.S. trade deficit in goods hits another record high in January
Bitcoin plunges 28% from all-time high as Trump pump turns into slump
item.description: Trump’s tariff threats are weighing on the crypto market as investors flee risky assets.
